title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, Watson, Belichick
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Right & wrong, Watson, Belichick
description:
Where Colin was right and wrong

The NFL needs to hurry up and suspend Deshaun Watson

Bill Belichick is making some strange decisions

 

Guest: Ethan Strauss
